text: The 1922 Ladies Open Championships was held at the Queen's Club, West Kensington in London from 7 February to 9 February 1922. Joyce Cave won the title defeating her older sister Nancy Cave in the final. ==Draw and results== ===Section A (Round Robin)=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=200| Player One !width=200|Player Two !width=30|Score |- | Miss Margorie Cave || Miss Joyce Cave ||18-15 |- | Miss Margorie Cave || Miss Partlington ||15-2 |- | Miss Margorie Cave || Mrs Carthew ||15-1 |- | Miss Margorie Cave || Miss Hope Prothero ||15-5 |- | Miss Joyce Cave || Miss Partlington ||15-0 |- | Miss Joyce Cave || Mrs Carthew ||15-3 |- | Miss Joyce Cave || Miss Hope Prothero ||17-14 |- | Miss Partlington || Miss Carthew ||11-15 |- | Miss Partlington || Miss Hope Prothero ||4-15 |- | Mrs Carthew || Miss Hope Prothero ||4-15 |} ===Section B (Round Robin)=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=200| Player One !width=200|Player Two !width=30|Score |- | Miss Nancy Cave || Mrs J Boldero ||15-0 |- | Miss Nancy Cave || Mrs Bruce + ||15-6 |- | Miss Nancy Cave || Miss Eileen Nicholson ||15-3 |- | Miss Nancy Cave || Miss Joyce Nicholson ||15-2 |- | Mrs Bruce + || Mrs J Boldero ||15-10 |- | Mrs Bruce + || Miss Eileen Nicholson ||15-10 |- | Mrs Bruce + || Miss Joyce Nicholson ||15-0 |- | Miss Joyce Nicholson || Miss Eileen Nicholson ||15-9 |- | Miss Joyce Nicholson || Mrs J Boldero ||15-11 |- | Miss Eileen Nicholson || Mrs J Boldero ||15-5 |} ===Semi finals=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=200| Player One !width=200|Player Two !width=200|Score |- | Miss Joyce Cave || Margorie Cave || 11-15 17-16 15-12 |- | Miss Nancy Cave || Mrs Bruce + || 15-2 16-13 |} ===Final=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=200| Player One !width=200|Player Two !width=200|Score |- | Miss Joyce Cave || Miss Nancy Cave || 11-15 15-10 15-9 |} \+ Honourable Mrs Clarence Bruce (née Margaret Bethune Black) ==References== Category:Women's British Open Squash Championships Women's British Open Squash Championship Women's British Open Squash Championship Category:Squash competitions in London Women's British Open Squash Championship
title: 1922 Women's British Open Squash Championship
